what_you_do: Dr. Stuti Nilesh Pardhe is the Founder & Visionary Leader of Etsah Trinity INC, a company dedicated to holistic healing, mental well-being, and community work.
social_proof: Holds a PG Diploma in Nutrition and Dietetics and a graduate in Naturopathy. Member of the College of Learning, London, and holder of British membership. American Psychological Membership, World Human Rights Protection Commission Membership and complimentary Medical Association Practitioner Membership.
signature_programs: Creator of the Neuro-CBT Practitioner Diploma, combining neuroscience with cognitive behavioral therapy.
business_focus: Advocates healing without drugs, stressing brain health, food, and physical activity.
service_provided: Holistic healing, mental well-being, community work
